about_the_game:
Join us for a round of golf with the A Little Golf Journey Demo and go on a short adventure on beautiful greens.

This demo includes:
  • The full first world set in a lush classic golf setting, including 10 golf levels, 3 secret levels and collectables
  • A sneak peek of the second world, taking place in mysterious Japanese gardens at dawn ...
  • Streamlined, intuitive golfing gameplay
  • Support for both controller and mouse & keyboard

We hope you enjoy this small preview of the full game - don't forget to wishlist us if you enjoyed your round of golf and feel free to say hi on the forums!

A Little Golf Journey s a lush relaxing game of golf played on miniature courses - a unique blend of real golf and mini-golf with no caddies and no clubs. Just you and the ball. Play a quick round on beautiful diorama courses inspired by classic golfing destinations and enjoy a moment of zen immersed in the calming sounds of nature.
